about_the_game:
Esca is an immersive survival RPG that invites you to step into the role of a small repair robot maintaining a deteriorating underwater research station. As you face daily challenges of repairing vital systems and scavenging for resources, you'll be forced to make tough decisions that could impact the station's survival.

Uncover secrets about your past and the true nature of the mission as you navigate through the station. Will you choose to preserve the station at any cost, or will you risk everything to unravel the mysteries beneath the surface?

With multiple paths and outcomes, every choice you make will shape the course of your journey. Each playthrough offers new challenges and fresh perspectives, providing a unique experience every time.

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains depictions of death, suicide. It falls within the horror genre and features unsettling themes throughout. Players should be aware that the atmosphere is designed to create tension and discomfort, with some scenes intended to be disturbing. The narrative includes dark and unsettling elements that may not be suitable for all audiences.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: Intel N4100 (or similar) or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 10 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-6100 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD is recommended for better loading.
